DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , multi-center , three-period , one sequence study investigate effect ketoconazole pharmacokinetics vemurafenib patient unresectable BRAFV600-mutation positive metastatic melanoma malignant tumor type harbor V600-activating mutation BRAF without acceptable standard treatment option . Patients receive single dose vemurafenib Periods A C multiple dos ketoconazole Periods B C. Eligible patient option continue treatment vemurafenib part extension study ( NCT01739764 ) . The anticipated time study treatment approximately 19 day .
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetics Study Investigate Effect Ketoconazole Vemurafenib Patients With BRAFV600 Mutation-Positive Metastatic Melanoma
